        public AttrDefinition getAttrDef(java.lang.String name)
        Parameters:
        name - AttrDefinition's name that will be returned.

      • hasAttrDef

        public java.lang.Boolean hasAttrDef(AttrDefinition def)
        Parameters:
        def - AttrDefinition that will be checked.
        Returns:
        True iff the implicit Congress set of AttrDefinitions contains 'def'; false otherwise.

      • toString

        public java.lang.String toString()
        Description copied from class: Graph
        Returns a string representation of the graph. First the Graph order and number of edges are printed, followed by the list of nodes of the graph, followed by the list of edges of the graph. The string ends with a new line.
        Overrides:
        toString in class Graph
        Returns:
        The string form of a Congress: the string of each MP and the list of relationship strength between them.

      • getMP

        public MP getMP(State s,
       int d)
        Parameters:
        s - State of the MP that will be returned.
        d - District number of the MP that will be returned.
        Returns:
        The MP with State 's' and district 'd', which should belong to the implicit Congress.
